title: Amazon gears up for NASA satellite data relay demonstration
summary: Amazon is preparing to demonstrate data relay services for NASA in the spring using upcoming production satellites for its Project Kuiper broadband constellation.

title: RFA Completes Full-Mission Hot Fire Test of Redshift Upper Stage
summary: German rocket builder Rocket Factory Augsburg has completed a full-mission hot fire test of its Redshift upper stage. The stage will now be sent to SaxaVord ahead of an inaugural RFA ONE flight later this year. The RFA ONE is a three-stage rocket that is designed to be capable of delivering up to 1,300 kilograms […]

title: NASA cancels half-billion dollar water-ice-seeking VIPER Moon rover
summary: Much of the rover was complete and it was going through a series of testing when the project was scrapped. NASA said Astrobotic’s Griffin lander, which was supposed to carry VIPER to the Moon’s South Pole, will still proceed with its mission.

title: ESA gears up for the Farnborough International Airshow
summary: The Farnborough International Airshow is set to return for its 76th edition from 22 to 26 July 2024, and ESA will be there to showcase the agency’s latest achievements and to highlight its next steps and future vision for Europe in space.

title: Firefly CEO leaves company
summary: The chief executive of Firefly Aerospace has left the company amid reports the company was investigating an alleged inappropriate relationship.

title: China prepares to launch new Long March 12 rocket
summary: China is set to boost its space launch capabilities as preparations for the first launch of the Long March 12 are underway at a new commercial space launch center.

title: NASA Cancels VIPER Lunar Rover
summary: NASA announced today that it intends to cancel the highly-anticipated VIPER lunar rover that was to search for water ice at the Moon’s South Pole. Stressing that the VIPER team […]

title: NASA cancels VIPER lunar rover
summary: BUSAN, South Korea — NASA has canceled a robotic lunar rover mission that would have searched for ice at the south pole of the moon, citing development delays and cost […]

title: NASA Rolls Out Second Core Stage for Artemis 2 Mission
summary: NASA Rolls Out Second Core Stage for Artemis 2 Mission
